description:
The code in get_all_vdis_in_sr, does not deal with the set of VDIs changing underneath the call.

if a VDI gets deleted, it could lead to a "HANDLE_INVALID VDI" error, or similar.
title: xenapi: race condition in get_all_vdis_in_sr
